flowOfCreationDescription: The diagram above illustrates the journey of an idea within the Pleasance federation, from a sovereign individual's inspiration to a tangible or communal reality. It is a cyclical process where creation, learning, and community engagement perpetually inspire new ideas.
community_page_subtitle: Find or form your own self-governing community.
community_find_desc: Search for communities to join or browse the list below.
community_create_desc: Describe the community you wish to bring into being. What is its purpose?
community_vision_placeholder: e.g., 'A community for devout astronomers to share celestial findings, photography, and organize stargazing vigils.'
community_create_with_ai_desc: Automatically generate a few AI members to help guide the conversation.
community_join_federation_desc: Log in to create your own communities and see the ones you've created.
community_must_be_logged_in: You must be logged in to create a community.
community_prompt_required_desc: Please enter an idea before refining with AI.
community_idea_refined_desc: The AI has expanded on your idea.
nuncy_lingua_subtitle: Generate a short story at your level, then practice with our karaoke-style player.
story_login_card_desc: Log in to generate stories and save your progress.
story_generation_error_profile: You must be logged in and have a complete profile to generate a story.
story_generation_error_unknown: An unknown error occurred while generating the story.
scribe_rankings_desc: Your intellectual creations have value. Earn Satoshis for every story you generate, where 1 Satoshi is pegged to $1 USD.
scribe_rankings_empty: The leaderboard is empty. Be the first to earn a score!
story_history_desc: Revisit stories you've generated in the past.
story_history_empty: You haven't generated any stories yet.
time_machine_desc: Create and view snapshots of your story history.
toast_snapshot_created_desc: Saved {count} stories to your Time Machine.
snapshot_desc: A view of your {count} stories from this point in time.
pricing_subtitle: Choose your level of commitment to the republic. Your contribution supports its growth.
pricing_note_title: A Note on Google Genkit Usage Fees
pricing_note_desc: The 'Clergy' and 'Founder' tiers are required to access advanced generative models like Gemini 1.5 Pro. An active subscription covers the associated Google Genkit API costs, ensuring the highest quality results for your creations. The free 'Congregation' tier uses standard models.

pricing_tiers.name: Congregation
pricing_tiers.description: Join the republic and participate in the community on the free tier.
features: View the Project Roadmap & Bug Tracker

pricing_tiers.name: Clergy
pricing_tiers.description: Lead the community with more powerful generative tools.
features: Create and lead your own Communities
Priority access to the Fabrication workshop

pricing_tiers.name: Founder
pricing_tiers.description: Shape the very fabric of the republic with direct influence.
features: Direct access to the founding partners

features.title: The Federal Community
features.description: The Federal Community is the social fabric of the republic where you can find or form your own self-governing community around any pursuit‚Äîa spiritual practice, a technology, or a philosophy. Each community has its own private workshop, roadmap, and treasury.

features.title: Nuncy Lingua
features.description: A tool for co-learning and increasing your intellectual holdings. Use Nuncy Lingua to learn new languages through AI-generated parables and listen to them with a karaoke-style speech player.

features.title: Workshop of Manifestation
features.description: The Workshop of Manifestation is where the ethereal becomes tangible. Submit creations from your Treasury to the ticketing system to have them manifested by a network of artisans and track your creation from concept to delivery.

features.title: The Treasury
features.description: Your worth is measured by your creations. The Treasury is your personal, sovereign ledger where you declare and manage your holdings, both physical and intellectual. Each community also has its own private treasury to archive all of its creations.

museum_subtitle: A grand hall showcasing the published creations from every community in the federation.
museum_future_title: From Virtual to Real: The Future of the Museum
museum_future_desc_1: This virtual gallery is the precursor to a physical space for art, learning, and community.
museum_future_desc_2: The creations you see here are the first seeds of a future vision: a real-world museum and center for interdisciplinary spirituality.
museum_error_desc: There was a problem loading the communities and their creations.
museum_empty_desc: No communities have published any creations yet.

roadmap_error_desc: There was an error connecting to the data source.
roadmap_column_ideas_desc: A seed of inspiration; a potential future for the republic.
roadmap_column_nextUp_desc: The forge is being prepared. These ideas are slated for manifestation.
roadmap_column_inProgress_desc: Actively being constructed in the workshop. Viewable on the staging server.
roadmap_column_alive_desc: A living part of the republic, actively serving its citizens.
roadmap_delete_dialog_desc: This will permanently delete the idea "{title}". This action cannot be undone.
toast_idea_removed_desc: The idea has been removed from the board.
toast_idea_added_desc: Your new idea has been added to the board.
toast_idea_generated_desc: "{title}" has been added to the board.
toast_refine_failed_desc: Please enter a title before refining with AI.

profile_avatar_name_required: Please enter your name first to generate avatars.

community_page_no_messages: No messages yet. Be the first!

community_page_member_invited_desc: {name} has been added to the community.
community_page_member_removed_desc: {name} has been removed from the community.
community_page_missing_info_desc: Community data is not loaded or you are not logged in.
community_page_generating_flag_desc: The AI is painting. This may take a moment.
community_page_new_flag_desc: Your community has a new look.
community_page_error_desc: There was a problem loading this community.
community_page_not_found_desc: We couldn't find the community you were looking for. It may have been deleted or the ID is incorrect.
community_page_no_flag: No flag has been generated for this community yet.
community_page_join_desc: Become a member to participate in the community.
community_page_leave_dialog_title: Are you sure you want to leave?
community_page_leave_dialog_desc: You will lose access to this community's private content. You can always request to join again later.
community_page_tools_desc: Use these tools to collaborate and create within the community.
community_page_join_requests_desc: Approve or decline requests from users who want to join your community.
community_page_all_users_members: All users are already members of this community.
community_page_remove_member_dialog_desc: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the community? They will need to request to join again.
community_page_presentation_hall_desc: A public showcase of this community's finest creations.
workshop_subtitle: A public sandbox to experiment with generative AI tools.
workshop_tool_desc: Enter a prompt and watch the AI bring your idea to life in a rotatable 3D space.
workshop_prompt_placeholder: e.g., 'The birth of a star', 'Silent forest morning'
workshop_save_to_treasury_desc: Declare this artwork as an intellectual property asset.
workshop_login_to_save_toast: You must be logged in to save an asset.
workshop_asset_saved_toast_desc: "{name}" has been added to your Treasury.
workshop_placeholder_text:
Your generated 3D art will appear here.
Click and drag to rotate.
workshop_about_what_is_it_desc: From a prompt to a constellation of pixels.
workshop_about_what_is_it_p1: In the context of our republic, "SVG3D" is the name we give to the generative art created in the Community Gallery. It's a 3D point-cloud, a collection of colored points in a three-dimensional space, rendered within a Scalable Vector Graphic (SVG).
workshop_about_what_is_it_p2: Think of it as a digital sculpture made of light. Each point has an X, Y, and Z coordinate, along with a color. When you provide a prompt to the AI, it doesn't just create a flat image; it imagines a 3D structure and represents it as this cloud of pixels. The interactive viewer then allows you to rotate and explore this structure in real-time.
workshop_about_generation_desc: How the AI translates your vision.
workshop_about_generation_p1: When you submit a prompt in the gallery, you're providing the AI with a conceptual seed. The AI uses this seed to determine the shape, color palette, and arrangement of the pixels. The parameters you control have a direct impact:
workshop_about_generation_li_prompt: Prompt: The most critical input. Concepts like "a lonely star" might produce a sparse, bright cloud, while "a dense nebula" would create a thick, colorful cluster.
workshop_about_generation_li_cubesize: Cube Size: This defines the conceptual boundary of the 3D space. While all points are mapped to a -50 to 50 range internally, this parameter can influence the perceived scale in the AI's generation.
workshop_about_generation_li_density: Density: This controls the number of points in the cloud. Low density is sparse (~300-500 points), while High density is rich and detailed (~2000-3000 points).
workshop_about_obj_p1: When you download your creation, you receive a .obj file. This is a standard 3D geometry definition file format. For our point clouds, the format is simple. Each line starts with a 'v', followed by the X, Y, and Z coordinates, and then the R, G, and B values for the color (normalized from 0 to 1).
workshop_about_obj_p2: This file is the digital blueprint that can be read by 3D fabrication software, bridging the gap between your virtual creation and a physical object.
workshop_about_physical_desc: Manifesting your creation in the real world.
workshop_about_physical_p1: The true power of this tool is realized when you manifest your creation. After saving your SVG3D artwork to your Treasury, you can submit it to the Workshop of Manifestation. The .obj file you generated is the key.
workshop_about_physical_p2: A network of artisans (like NNO.Studio for 3D printing) can use this file to create a physical representation of your digital sculpture. This is the final step in the journey from a simple idea to a tangible asset, a testament to the creative power of the republic.
workshop_about_physical_cta: Go to the Workshop of Manifestation
fabrication_your_orders_desc: Track the status of your fabrication orders.
fabrication_no_orders: You have no active fabrication orders.
fabrication_new_order_desc: Select an asset from your Treasury to bring into the physical world.

treasury_financial_system_desc: The value of assets is measured in Satoshis, where 1 Satoshi is pegged to $1 USD.

treasury_asset_desc_placeholder: Describe your asset, its value, or its purpose.

treasury_your_assets_desc: A list of your physical and intellectual assets.
treasury_empty_desc: Declare your first asset using the form above.
treasury_orders_desc: Track the status of your fabrication orders.
treasury_no_orders: You have no active fabrication orders.

bug_tracker_form_title_placeholder: e.g., 'Save button is unresponsive in the Altar of Creation'
bug_tracker_form_desc_placeholder: Please provide steps to reproduce the issue...
bug_tracker_list_desc: A list of all issues reported by the community.
bug_tracker_no_bugs: No bugs have been reported. All is in harmony. üôè

conductor_subtitle: Your conversational interface to the application.

conductor_input_placeholder: Ask the Conductor... (e.g., 'What is being worked on right now?')
